main event: Prison guards at Norfolk observed a slow moving greenish object moving south at a low altitude on 24 July 1952.
interesting points: The object was round and flat, appearing tilted., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 to 5 seconds., The object was followed by a loud rushing noise., The guards reported the object to be 3 to 5 feet in diameter and black in color., No identification action was taken by the authorities after the sighting.
witness description: prison guards at Norfolk Prison Colony
